 
DECLARE @projectId SMALLINT
DECLARE @wareID SMALLINT
DECLARE @storeID INT


IF NOT EXISTS (
       SELECT *
       FROM   Table_035_ProjectInfo AS tpi
   )
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO Table_035_ProjectInfo
      (
        -- Column00 -- this column value is auto-generated
        Column01,
        Column02
      )
    VALUES
      (
        1,
        N'پروژه پیش فرض'
      )
    SET @projectId = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    SET @projectId = (
            SELECT TOP 1 tpi.Column00
            FROM   Table_035_ProjectInfo AS tpi
        )
END


IF NOT EXISTS (
       SELECT *
       FROM   PWHRS_NULL.dbo.Table_001_PWHRS AS tp
   )
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO PWHRS_NULL.dbo.Table_001_PWHRS
      (
        -- columnid -- this column value is auto-generated
        column01,
        column02
      )
    VALUES
      (
        1,
        N'انبار پیش فرض'
      )
    SET @wareID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    SET @wareID = (
            SELECT TOP 1 tp.columnid
            FROM   PWHRS_NULL.dbo.Table_001_PWHRS AS tp
        )
END


INSERT INTO [Table_295_StoreInfo]
  (
    [Column00],
    [Column01],
    [Column02],
    [Column03],
    [Column04],
    [Column05],
    [Column06],
    [Column07],
    [Column08],
    [Column09],
    [Column10],
    [Column11],
    [Column12],
    [Column13],
    [Column14],
    [Column15]
  )
VALUES
  (
    1,
    N'فروشگاه پیش فرض',
    NULL,
    NULL,
    @wareID,
    @projectId,
    NULL,
    NULL,
    0,
    NULL,
    'Admin',
    GETDATE(),
    'Admin',
    GETDATE(),
    NULL,
    NULL
  )
SET @storeID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
INSERT INTO Table_296_StoreUsers
SELECT @storeID,
       tui.Column00,
       'Admin',
       GETDATE(),
       'Admin',
       GETDATE()
FROM   PERP_MAIN.dbo.Table_010_UserInfo AS tui
WHERE  tui.Column06 = '1399'
       AND tui.Column05 = 1
  
GO
